Entries.98890000/p Wizard/t 600 2000/n WizardAxL: WizardSong/7 6/farmer 8 5 3 Wizard 6 5 1/skippable/pause 1500/speak Wizard "...Well, @, I have excellent news for you.$0#$b#I was able to craft a warp that would take you to Axolotl Village.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Wizard "Kin spoke of how frequently you asked him about the village.$0#$b#...And quite frankly, those axolotls could use a bit of interaction with a human.$0#$b#I think this would be good for everyone involved.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah, Kin made it clear to you how distrustful the axolotls are of humans, right?$0#$b#Not to worry.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 1000/speak Wizard "You see, I am actually well-acquainted with one of the axolotls living there.$0#$b#We were good friends at one point in time.$0"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "That time has long since passed.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Either way, I have contacted her and let her know that you would like to visit the village.$0#$b#I made sure to emphasize how you are a kind human who means no harm whatsoever.$0#$b#But I think what really made her trust that is by mentioning how close you and Kin had become.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Those axolotls really did care for Kin, even though he could not see it.$0#$b#In fact...they were more similar to him than he realized.$0"/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 1000/speak Wizard "But anyhow, she said she would let the others know a 'good' human is coming to visit.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Wizard "You are already excited, aren't you?$0#$b#Very well then, I will give you the recipe for the warp right away.$0"/pause 500/addCraftingRecipe otohime.AV_AV_Warp_Totem/message "Wizard hands you the recipe for crafting an Axolotl Village warp."/pause 500/speak Wizard "It should be fairly easy to make.$0#$b#...But if you don't feel like crafting, I have also summoned a warp that will take you to the village.$0#$b#It's located on the left pier at the beach.$0#$b#The warp totem and warp point both grant you the ability to understand and communicate the unique language of the axolotls.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "Now, @...$0#$b#Make sure to treat those axolotls kindly.$0#$b#Don't let my good word of you go to waste.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 56/pause 1000/end
Entries.98890032/p Wizard/t 600 2000/n WizardAxL: WizardSong/7 6/farmer 8 5 3 Wizard 6 5 1 Captain 0 24 0 Hiro 1 24 0 Jinx 2 24 0 Lala 3 24 0 Lulu 4 24 0 Nimue 5 24 0 Noa 6 24 0 Olina 7 24 0 Puka 8 24 0/pause 1500/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "...So one of the axolotls was originally a mermaid.$0#$b#I see.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "Believe it or not, the information I have for you actually relates to this very well.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Wizard "So, you remember how I told you that Nimue and I used to be good friends, right?$0#$b#Well...she was originally a human.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Wizard "A witch, in fact.$0#$b#She was fairly skilled as well.$0#$b#But something she always struggled with were transformation spells and potions.$0#$b#She could never quite nail those down.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "But I guess she was able to finally figure it out...considering where she is now.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "I still wonder why she decided to change her whole life around to live amongst axolotls, but that doesn't really matter now.$0#$b#If she's happy living that life, then so be it.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "But...you're starting to see a pattern with all of these larger axolotls, aren't you?$0#$b#Kin, Puka, Nimue...$0#$b#And how they were not originally axolotls.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "Well, I have the feeling that none of the axolotls living in that village are truly axolotls.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/fade/viewport -500 -500/changeLocation otohime.AV_Abyss/warp farmer 0 0/warp Wizard 0 1/warp Hiro 53 61/warp Puka 54 61/warp Lala 55 61/warp Lulu 56 61/warp Captain 57 61/warp Nimue 58 61/warp Jinx 59 61/warp Olina 60 61/warp Noa 61 61/faceDirection Hiro 2/faceDirection Puka hunch is correct..."/message "...And it usually is..."/pause 1000/fade/viewport -200 -200/changeSprite Hiro Human/changeSprite Puka Human/changeSprite Lala Human/changeSprite Lulu Human/changeSprite Captain Human/changeSprite Nimue Human/changeSprite Jinx Human/changeSprite Olina Human/changeSprite Noa Human/fade/viewport 57 61/pause 1500/message "All of those axolotls are just transformed humans."/pause 500/message "Well, humans and a mermaid, rather."/pause 500/fade/viewport -500 -500/changeLocation WizardHouse/warp farmer 8 5/warp Wizard 6 5/warp Captain 0 24/warp Hiro 1 24/warp Jinx 2 24/warp Lala 3 24/warp Lulu 4 24/warp Nimue 5 24/warp Noa 6 24/warp Olina 7 24/warp Puka 8 24/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Wizard 1/fade/viewport 7 6/pause 1000/speak Wizard "I guess they all had their own reasons for wanting to leave their old lives behind.$0#$b#Transforming into axolotls and living in the village was the main goal, but their memories being wiped seems like it was the cherry on top of the cake.$0#$b#They WANTED to forget their pasts.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "But if my thoughts on all of this are correct, I am also to assume that the others will regain their memories as well.$0#$b#...Which is why I think I must warn Nimue about this.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "Nimue herself still has all of her past memories as far as I'm aware, but I'm sure she'll understand how scary of an experience this may be for the others.$0"/pause 500/jump farmer 5/pause 500/emote farmer 36/pause 500/speak Wizard "Puka asked you not to tell the others?$0#$b#Well, I'm sorry, but I think this is the right thing to do.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Wizard "Don't worry too much.$0#$b#I'm sure Puka will understand.$0"/pause 1000/end
